title: @Riot Wtf is this???
body: My internet is just fine and pretty fast. I just got out of a game and this appears.

replies.body: The NA servers experienced some service incidents yesterday around the time you posted this, which have since been resolved. Let me know if you're still experiencing this.

Same. Would like an explanation rito >:I but not about this, about why you no give me lux skin yet >:0. Okay, I want an answer to both! >:o. Also Im not really mad, I just really like the way the mad emotes look, theyre pretty silly. I like the offset to the eyes compared to the mouth :0 its cute
